name: Sibo Wang 0001
content: Sibo WANG Associate Professor Department of Systems Engineering and Engineering Management The Chinese University of Hong Kong Address: Room 507, William M. W. Mong Engineering Building, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shatin, N.T., Hong Kong Email: Tel: (852)3943-8310 Home Group Publications Teaching Services Biography I am an Associate Professor at the Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK). I received my B.E. in Software Engineering in 2011 from Fudan University and PhD in Computer Science in 2016 from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. Research Interest Database, data mining and machine learning, with a special interest in big data processing and analytics. Current topics include: Sampling-based approximation algorithm design; Effective index design; Efficient dynamic data processing; Large data analysis, especially large-scale graph data analysis. Hiring I am looking for self-motivated research assistants, PhD and postdocs. For interested applicants, please send me a detailed transcript (of the applicant's undergraduate study and postgraduate study if applicable) and a CV that lists the applicant's awards (since high school) and publications.
